comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: A picture of the Beckers at the time of his second murder trial in 1914: news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1368&dat=19140512&... The building at 2291 University Avenue in the Bronx, where Helen Becker lived, was also where her husband's body was brought following her husband's execution at Sing Sing on July 30, 1915. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9407EFDF1138E633A... The building and its neighbors look more or less the same in this 2011 Google Street View image, though the gas street lamp has been replaced by an electric one, the stained glass on the stairway windows has been replaced, the basement windows bricked in, and fire escapes added: maps.google.com/maps?q=2291+university+avenue,+n.y.&l...
